dialogue.text: Aye, we've reached the docks, me boy! The folks here ain't privy to our visits, so ye best head out quick.
Safe travels, matey!
…bye.
Urgh… finally…
Well… thanks for helping me get here, Salty.
But of course! Ye were a fine temporary member of me crew, Sour me boy!
Heh heh… forreal though. I appreciate it. Wish I could've gotten more into the fun y'all were having.
In due time, ye will have yerself a proper pair o’ sea legs.
And tell ye what! If ye or yer sweetiepie spot me ship out at sea wherever ye may be, jus' call to us with a “Way ho!” and we'll wrangle ye up and bring ye wherever ye need!
As long as yer prepared to join us in song again with that piano-lookin’ doohickey o’ yours, of course! Yahahaharrr!!!
Bet, bet. I'll try not to be a stranger.
Good! Now go, me boy! It won't be long ‘till sundown!
[Sour begins his walk through Corianda…]
Geez, who designed these roads? This feels like a maze.
[More time passes. Sour cannot determine whether or not he's made any progress through the town.]
Nah, what the actual hell is this layout? How does anyone get through here?!
I really hope I ain't keeping her waiting… She did say to call for someone if I got lost… what was their name again..?
Uhh… was something like… Seeker… or Finder…
Wayfinder! Yo, Wayfinder! You out there?
…*tired grumbles*
Hmm?
...disculpe, señor. Were you the one calling for me?
…yes?
[Was this guy sleeping in the alley? This early too?]
…are you the Wayfinder?
Sí... You must be lost if you call for my aid. How shall I assist?
Uhh… I'm trying to reach this restaurant up at the top of this place… Chicory’s Cuisines. If you can, like, help me find my way there, that would be dope.
*tired nod*
Understood. Come, let us be on our way.
[The two begin a slow walk through Corianda.]
Oh, uhh… almost forgot. My partner wanted to give you her best regards, I think.
Partner… hmm…
Partner... partner... do you happen to mean… Sweet?
Yeah, that's her.
Ah, you should've said something sooner, amigo! ¡Rápido, no nos queda mucho tiempo antes del atardecer!
Wh- huh? Where was this energy 20 minutes ago?!
Ah, you see… I had assisted Sweet when she first stepped into this town, searching for her boat to reach you.
On her return trip, she called for me to give her thanks for my prior assistance. It was a very touching gesture… but…
...once she was already long gone through the town, I discovered she had dropped this.
Her baton? Crap, I gotta get that back to her!
Follow my lead! I know the fastest route to the edge of town. You don't mind sprinting there, no?
It's been a long day… but I don't want to leave her waiting too much longer. Let's go, Wayfinder!
¡Vamos, muchacho!
